mods.abstract: Page 53 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [234] shows a horse exhibited in profile by a man in a suit and hat. Fairground stables in the background.; Photograph 2 [235] shows a horse exhibited in 3/4 view by a man in a suit and hat. Fairground stables in the background.; Photograph 3 [236] shows a horse exhibited in profile by a man in a suit and hat. Building with signage in the background.
mods.note: All photographs probably taken at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
